com.hitlabnz.outdoorar.api
Class OAAPI

java.lang.Object
  com.hitlabnz.outdoorar.api.OAAPI

public class OAAPI
extends java.lang.Object

API class for using ready-to-use components. For the map component, a valid Google Map API key must be defined as "map_api_key" string resource.

Author:
Leigh Beattie

Returns:

removeWorldScene

public void removeWorldScene(OAScene worldScene)
Use this method to remove a world scene from the database of scenes. Any scenes you remove will no longer show up in the respective activities that you start using this API.

Parameters:
worldScene -

addWorldScene

public void addWorldScene(OAScene worldscene)
Use this method to add a world scene into the database of scenes. Any scenes you add will be used in any respective activitys that you start using this API.

Parameters:
worldscene - The scene you want to add to the database of scenes.

startListComponent

public void startListComponent()
Enable the list view mode. This will start a new activity showing the scenes that you added in a list view.

startARComponent

public void startARComponent()
Enable the AR view mode. This will start a new activity showing the scenes that you added in an AR visualisation.

startMapComponent

public void startMapComponent()
Enable the Map view mode. This will start a new activity showing the scenes that you added in a map visualisation.

getDataManager

public OADataManager getDataManager()
Get the data manager if you absolutely need to.

Returns:
The datamanager associated with the API.
